task.name: gaincalR
task.shortdescription: Task for robust calibration of data.
task.description: An alternate version of gaincal that computes the gain using a robust L2 minimization procedure.

param.name: vis
param.description: Name of input visibility file

param.name: caltable
param.description: Name of output gain calibration table

param.name: field
param.description: Select field using field id(s) or field name(s)

param.name: spw
param.description: Select spectral window/channels

param.name: selectdata
param.description: Other data selection parameters

param.name: uvrange
param.description: Select data within uvrange

param.name: scan
param.description: Scan number range

param.name: observation
param.description: Select by observation ID(s)

param.name: solint
param.description: Solution interval: egs. inf, int, 60s

param.name: combine
param.description: Data axes which to combine for solve (currently only scan is supported)

param.name: refant
param.description: Reference antenna index (The order is same as that shown in listobs output with the first antenna having an index 0)

param.name: minblperant
param.description: Minimum baselines _per antenna_ required for solve

param.name: minsnr
param.description: Reject solutions below this SNR

param.name: calmode
param.description: Type of solution: (ap, p, a)

param.name: robust
param.description: Perform robust calibration using an outlier detection algorithm.

param.name: outlieralgorithm
param.description: Type of outlier detection: (RMS, Median)

param.name: threshold
param.description: Baselines are marked as outliers if they are more than n*sigma deviant from the model where sigma is computed from the data and the value of n is specified in this parameter. E.g n=[7,5,3].

param.name: dosolintflag
param.description: Flag within solution interval, both along spectral and temporal axis.

param.name: mingain
param.description: Amplitude threshold for flagging dead antennas.

param.name: combinepoln
param.description: Combine polarizations before solving for gains

param.name: combinespw
param.description: Combine spectral windows before solving for gains

param.name: solnorm
param.description: Normalize amplitude of solutions to unity.

param.name: combinecorrnorm
param.description: Normalize globally by combining all correlations.

param.name: usemedian
param.description: Use median of amplitudes to estimate central value. If set to false, mean is used.

param.name: debugmode
param.description: Turns on verbose outputs.
